testcase.name: And match response.time.updated contains call currentDate
And match response.time.updatedISO contains call currentISODate
And match response.disclaimer contains "This data was produced from the CoinDesk Bitcoin Price Index (USD). Non-USD currency data converted using hourly conversion rate from openexchangerates.org"
When request { "title":"this is the title", "body":"this is the body", "userId":"1" }
And match response contains {"title":"this is the title", "body":"this is the body", "userId":"1", "id": 101}
And match response contains {"title":"updated title", "body":"updated title", "userId":"1", "id": 1}
